amendatorysection.catchline: Temporary educational permit; application; department; duties.
amendatorysection.para: Before granting any temporary educational permit, the department, with the recommendation of the board, shall ascertain that an authorized provider of graduate medical education, a fellowship, or a refresher course has requested the issuance of a temporary educational permit for an applicant to participate in its graduate medical education, fellowship, or refresher course for the period involved.
